cab.content: (This Document is the Property of-r1. iHis Britannic Majesty's Government.)Operations.SECRET.From :- General Plumer, Italy. To :- C.I.G.S., War Office.Despatched 7.20 p.m. 19.11.17,.Received 10 p.m. 19,11.17,0.25.You will receive Radcliffe's report. The situation is practically unchanged. Our 23rd and 41st divisions commenced their march eastwards from Mantua this morning and had a very good reception on their march.
